solution_line_template: Madeline needs to buy {death_rate_multiplier}*{flowers_needed}=<<{death_rate_multiplier}*{flowers_needed}={seeds_to_plant}>>{seeds_to_plant} seeds to make sure that she will have {flowers_needed} flowers.
Thus, Madeline will need to buy {packs_needed} packs of flowers to have at least {seeds_to_plant} seeds.
Thus, Madeline will spend {packs_needed}*{cost_per_pack}=${packs_needed}*{cost_per_pack}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on seeds.
